item.title: The 3 Types of Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies people Iâ€™ve met
item.author: michael@datachain.consulting (Michael John PeÃ±a)
item.description: I’ve been in the crazy Blockchain space for quite a while now. I’ve had a lot of conversations and people I’ve met online and in-person to talk about it. Over and over, I see patterns on the people I interact with whether they do it as part of their job, an enthusiast, developer, investor, or simply just a person. I’ve probably had hundreds of interactions already and most likely, they will belong to either of these 3 buckets.
